::: justify
Our ultimate hope for Palaeoverse is community involvement. One important way you can contribute to Palaeoverse is by volunteering to review code, documentation and/or resources. If you are interested in registering as an official reviewer for Palaeoverse, please complete the following form. We will periodically run training workshops on how to review code via GitHub.

If you face any issues with completing this form, please contact <a href="mailto:LewisA.Jones@outlook.com" style="text-decoration: none" target="_blank">**Lewis A. Jones**</a> or <a href="mailto:willgearty@gmail.com" style="text-decoration: none" target="_blank">**William Gearty**</a>.
:::
